Job Title: Hiring Back Office Executive For an E-Commerce Company
Job Description: Dear Candidates, Job overview: The job requires candidates to quality audit/check (QA) product title, description, feature and review images of existing listed products on E-Commerce portal/tool. Job responsibilities: 1. The QA work needs to be done as per the quality guidelines shared by the client. 2. The QA work will involve improving content in terms of grammar and vocabulary and information accuracy. 3. Writing of fresh description and features of various products is to be done as and when required 4. The candidate needs to engage in periodical training as and when conducted by mentors/process owners Education: Any GraduateCandidate must have there own desktop/laptop.Interested please send your resume to monika.barnwal@netscribes.comThanks & RegardsMonika Barnwal
Functional Area: Executive Assistant, Front Office, Data Entry,
